events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it arrived in the wrong size, and I'd like to request a refund because the exchange process is too slow.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving the wrong size item.
Assigning a customer service agent to handle the refund request for the incorrectly sized jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us, I'm here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket you received.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the jacket you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Thanks for replying. My order number is 458923-A and I have attached a photo of the jacket highlighting the wrong size tag.
We have verified your details and will process a full refund. You should see the money back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for the prompt solution! I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund has been initiated and the case is now resolved. Please contact us if you encounter any further issues.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your case closure.
Thank you for confirming the refund. We are closing your support case now. Have a great day!
We have sent a short survey to gather your feedback about your recent support experience. Your input is valuable to us.
